curl.mp4.description: Pip discovers a magical steam loom that knits glowing cozywear out of warm mist—resulting in the cutest floating scarf attack ever. ☁️🧶✨ #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #CozyMagic #WhimsicalWorkshop #SteamCraft #OtterInventor
curl.mp4.title: Pip and the Cozy Curl Steam Loom ☁️🧶✨

echoink.mp4.description: Pip discovers a sound reactive ink board that turns his squeaks into shimmering floating artwork—and gets adorably booped by living paint. 🎨✨ #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #EchoInk #MagicWorkshop #WhimsicalScience #OtterInventor
echoink.mp4.title: Pip and the Echo Ink Ripple Board 🎨🔊✨

frost.mp4.description: Made a teeny tiny magical blizzard today! I got snowed on!!! ❄️🌀✨ #PipsProjects #MagicWorkshop #CuteOtter #WinterWhimsy
frost.mp4.title: The Frost Whirl Mini Blizzard Cone ❄️🌀✨

sunbeam.mp4.description: I caught sunbeams today!! They were warm and tickly and VERY sparkly!! ☀️✨ #PipsProjects #SunMagic #CuteOtter
sunbeam.mp4.title: The Sunbeam Pinwheel Collector

glowmap.mp4.description: Pip tests a magical compass that draws glowing paths in midair—and ends up chasing a sparkling trail full of surprises. ✨🧭 #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #MagicCompass #WhimsicalScience #AIAnimation #OtterInventor
glowmap.mp4.title: Pip and the Glow Map Compass ✨🧭

lantern.mp4.description: Pip discovers a lantern that transforms his emotions into living mosaics of light—and it turns his workshop into a glowing mood show. ✨🪄 #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #MoodMagic #WhimsicalWorkshop #AIAnimation #OtterInventor
lantern.mp4.title: Pip and the Mood Mosaic Lantern ✨🪄

solar.mp4.title: Pip and the Solar Spark Seed Spinner ☀️🌀🌱
solar.mp4.description: Pip experiments with a solar charged seed that sprouts glowing mini plants—and ends up dusted in sunlit sparkles. ☀️🌱✨ #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #SolarMagic #WhimsicalWorkshop #ScienceMagic #OtterInventor
